title: Gunfire erupts at JP party, six wounded
content:
Six people were shot and one victim was rushed to the hospital with life-threatening injuries Friday night after violence erupted at an 18-year-old’s birthday party in Jamaica Plain, authorities said.
Five men and one woman, all between the ages of 18 and 22, were shot when an argument spilled onto the street about 11:15 p.m., according to Boston Police Department spokeswoman Neva Coakley. The unidentified victims were all taken to area hospitals.
